recipe.title: Conch Salad, Man!
ingredients: 1 jalapeño pepper, stemmed, seeded and minced
1/4 ripe Florida avocado, diced, or 1/2 ripe Haas avocado (optional)
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients except the tomato and avocado in a large bowl. Stir and refrigerate for at least 2 hours to allow the flavors to develop.
To serve, fold in the tomato and avocado. Transfer to 4 chilled glasses or serving bowls.
